traits.name: Death Burst
entries: When the bloodfin dies, it explodes in a cloud of toxic blood. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the exploding bloodfin, including any creature swallowed by the bloodfin, must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage. A creature inside the bloodfin when it explodes falls {@condition prone} in the space formerly occupied by the bloodfin and is no longer {@condition blinded} or {@condition restrained} by it.

traits.name: Water Breathing
entries: The bloodfin can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The bloodfin makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5 damage) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the bloodfin can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit (with advantage if the target is a creature missing any hit points), reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (4d6 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage.
